snippet.title: Stronghold Crusader 2 - Mini-Campaigns Trailer
snippet.description:
Delivering Justice: http://store.steampowered.com/app/317590/
Freedom Fighters: http://store.steampowered.com/app/317591/

Firefly Studios has released new ‘Delivering Justice’ and ‘Freedom Fighters’ mini-campaign DLCs for Stronghold Crusader 2. Set during the events of the main story campaign these mini-DLCs introduce new missions, achievements and challenges suitable for all players. Formerly an exclusive pre-order bonus, the mini-DLCs are now being sold separately on Steam for $0.99, £0.99 or €0.99 each. Achievement hunters, completionists and Stronghold veterans can finally complete their Stronghold Crusader 2 collection!

Stronghold Crusader 2: Delivering Justice

Set during the events of the Crusader story campaign, you play as an honourable Crusader Lord fighting to maintain order in the Holy Land. On the path to Jerusalem you must protect vulnerable Arab merchants, fend off raiding parties and capture enemy strongholds before confronting an old enemy.

Stronghold Crusader 2: Freedom Fighters
Set during the Arabic story campaign, one fearless Lord takes the fight to the invading Crusader hordes. After defending Saladin’s farmland, you must enlist the aid of The Shah and counterattack! Lure the cowardly Crusaders into the desert then assault the mountain camp where they make a last stand.
